title: Sound On: Biden Domestic Agenda in Limbo, Biden in Europe
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden Domestic Agenda in Limbo, Biden in Europe
description:
Guests: Democratic Congressman Ritchie Torres of New York, Bloomberg Washington Bureau Chief Peggy Collins, Political News Director for Bloomberg TV and Radio, Jodi Schneider, New York City mayoral candidates Curtis Sliwa and Eric Adams, and Bloomberg reporter Skylar Woodhouse.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
